description: An hpnicfPexPortOnline trap is sent when the PEX transitions to
online state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-PEX-MIB::hpnicfPexPortOnline HPN-ICF-PEX-MIB::hpnicfPexPortId i 9999 HPN-ICF-PEX-MIB::hpnicfPexPortDescr s EXAMPLE

description: ID that can be used to uniquely identify a PEX port. The value range
is hpnicfPexPortMinId to hpnicfPexPortMaxId.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PEX-MIB::hpnicfPexPortId

description: Description for the PEX port. The default value is
'pex-port XXXX', where 'XXXX' is hpnicfPexPortId.
Writing a zero-length string to this object resets the value to the
default.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PEX-MIB::hpnicfPexPortDescr

description: An hpnicfPexPortOnline trap is sent when the PEX transitions to
offline state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-PEX-MIB::hpnicfPexPortOffline HPN-ICF-PEX-MIB::hpnicfPexPortId i 9999 HPN-ICF-PEX-MIB::hpnicfPexPortDescr s EXAMPLE

description: ID that can be used to uniquely identify a PEX port. The value range
is hpnicfPexPortMinId to hpnicfPexPortMaxId.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PEX-MIB::hpnicfPexPortId

description: Description for the PEX port. The default value is
'pex-port XXXX', where 'XXXX' is hpnicfPexPortId.
Writing a zero-length string to this object resets the value to the
default.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PEX-MIB::hpnicfPexPortDescr

description: An hpnicfPexPhyPortForwarding trap is sent when the PEX physical port
transitions to forwarding state.

event.Summary: PEX physical port transitions to forwarding state

description: This index is identical to entPhysicalIndex in ENTITY-MIB.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PEX-MIB::hpnicfPexEntPhysicalIndexBind

description: A textual description of physical entity. This object
should contain a string that identifies the manufacturer's
name for the physical entity, and should be set to a
distinct value for each version or model of the physical
entity.
variables.name: ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalDescr

description: An hpnicfPexPhyPortBlocked trap is sent when the PEX physical port
transitions from forwarding state to blocked state.

event.Summary: PEX physical port transitions from forwarding state to blocked state

description: This index is identical to entPhysicalIndex in ENTITY-MIB.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-PEX-MIB::hpnicfPexEntPhysicalIndexBind

description: A textual description of physical entity. This object
should contain a string that identifies the manufacturer's
name for the physical entity, and should be set to a
distinct value for each version or model of the physical
entity.
variables.name: ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalDescr
